body: Hm. Well, unfappable, naturaly. Massive censor and shitty English totally kill it. Story is interesting though, maybe someone can do better translation and un-fuck that shitty censor from there while at it. I'll read again then. ^^)

@glycolog
That link is dead, is there an updated link? Or just translation URLs?

Alright so it was good but when I started getting deeper into to the story it started to grow out of my liking like I COULDN'T GET HARD FROM THE SEX SCENES ANY MORE!!! But it was an interesting story for the most part. So keep up the good work👏

remos16 I think the part she was doing for her mum was more not commiting suicide thing since thats like the biggest shame you can bring upon a relative over there. Now, if you if you'll excuse me i'll go sit and cry in a corner for an hour ;-;

Yea knew i knew she was going to have a rough life but damn man no one in the word or in a made up one deserve to have that kind of life and i get that your mom is the most important person in the world bu i would no even go through that for her
Wtf man. Nice colors and stuff but that story is just cruel as fuck, damn
Haven't checked updates in some months. Blue hair sex, was not disappointed

dafuq..OK she have a shit stepfather but why the hell she was thinking ''OH I GOTTA SAVE THIS MAN OR MY MOM WILL BE SAD'' 
where is the logic here?
I'm sure as hell that her mother knew her husband was trading her daughter this whole time and that is even sadder than losing a pathetic husband. There are 50 million people in Korea and why her mother cant choose a nice guy?Does she have any relatives that can help provide hospitality? If not then I think her mom and herself can live by themselves and not depending on another useless man.
Where's the justice wen we need them
so I understand why Rich Chigga is hardest nigger ever. Working for it lyric goddamn explain this dojin.

why does he even bother thinking about her. yes she might still love him deep in her heart but man who in they right mind will even consider going back to her .girls like her you should just fell sad for them (PS: she is dead inside)
Damn koreans. They could be legends, but they have to do rape garbage instead .-. Im calling it rape because she kinda had no choice at wont point.
WTF KOREA!!!!

for fuck's sake, someone please tag this NTR. I'm also fucking tired of these depressing korean manhwas. I came here to jack off, not get my heart broken. Jeez, I can't even get it up anymore after reading this

Tips for anyone in this kind of world,violence is the fasted way out  either you get out or die trying dont fall for fake hopes or lie,violence is your answer. PS ,the boyfriend is dumb as fuck if he is this fucking clueless,also typical korean mahwa the dude is always in the right but try to justify their stupidity n small dick complex,whereas the female is always the one dominated,BS on that.
